reviews.review_msg: You can tell that Maya is a caring soul. Even though you could easily skip most classes and still get a good grade, I found myself wanting to attend each one. This is a great class about life circumstances and the health of society and it makes you think outside the box. The world would be a better place if everyone was required to take this class

I cannot say enough of Maya Gislason! I did not think it would be possible to adore a prof more. It is only half way through the semester and I was so inclined to get on here and write a review because she is that PHENOMENAL!
